text:
Augusto Martelli (15 March 1940 - 3 November 2014) was an Italian composer, conductor, arranger and television personality. He was known for composing the song "Djamballà". It was the theme song of the 1971 movie "Il dio serpente". Martelli was born in Genoa, Italy.
Martelli died in Milan, Italy, aged 74.
